## âš¡ PR Title Guidelines

**Please format your PR title using the Conventional Commits format.** This helps in automating labels and release notes.

**Available Types:**

- `feat` â€“ New features
- `fix` â€“ Bug fixes
- `docs` â€“ Documentation updates
- `chore` â€“ Maintenance tasks
- `refactor` â€“ Code changes that neither fix a bug nor add a feature
- `security` â€“ Security-related changes
- `dependencies` â€“ Dependency updates
- `breaking` â€“ Introduces incompatible API changes

## ğŸ“‹ Checklist
